remarks: Value of the conditional operator for propositions when its first argument is false.  Analogue for propositions of ~ iffalse .  This is essentially ~ dedlemb .  (Contributed by BJ, 20-Sep-2019.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Jun-2020.)
statement: ifpfal $p |- ( -. ph -> ( if- ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ch ) ) $.
